2025-07-30.content: Support for [Go 1.25 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/flexible/go/runtime) is in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products/#product-launch-stages). This runtime is available for early testers using existing [release candidates](https://go.dev/dl/#unstable).

summary.title: Go 1.25 runtime available for early testers
Go 1.24 runtime now in preview
summary.summary: The Go 1.24 runtime is now available in preview for Google App Engine flexible environment. This update provides the latest features and improvements for Go developers.
